review: I am really enjoying it. A must if you are an amazon prime member.
author: Patricia Balcziunas

review: Easy to install and so far works well with the TV and does what it is supposed to do!  Enjoying it.
author: C. G. Francis

review: I was never bothered by the buffering time on my smart TV or Blu-ray player until I tried the Fire TV Stick.  The Fire TV Stick plays shows and videos much faster.  Great Product.
author: Ike

review: kinda glitchy  not a huge fan of sling tv on it  but the amazon stuff played ok
author: Phil Fraley

review: Awesome gadgit, works perfectly. Free movies and music. Simple set up too
author: Blaine S.

review: Will only hold the wireless signal on the same floor as the modem/router.
author: Shuffley

review: MIne works fine for 30 minutes then has to be reset. Every time I start it up it has to be re-set. While watching a program It stops and has to re load every 15 minutes.  I have high speed DSL 6.7 Mbs.  and it still has problems. So overall it is just OK.
author: Trent Johnson

review: Like it, but it stops often to buffer.
author: Kevin
